title: Can't log into the game after changing my password
body: When I try to log into the game, it tells me: "Invalid username/password combination." but I know its right because I can still log in at this website. When I then try to change my password in the settings they send me these 6 numbers per mail. I type them in correctly but they always tell me "Service Unavailable". It's not my computer because I can still log into the game with other accounts. I have no idea what to do.

replies.body:
Did you make sure that you were logging into the right Region? Before you hit launch on the right hand side you will see a little drop down that says what Region you are in, make sure you have the right one selected! 

If the issue still persist's then I recommend using Riot's login KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues <----- this thingy here. 

THEN if that doesn't work and you haven't thrown your computer out the window in rage  
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻ Then you should probably submit a ticket.

Heya **Firubie**,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug here in the Help and Support boards, you'll likely want to report bugs in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards to gain more visibility from the relevant Riot staff!
